[:page:PageHeader][:toc:]
+ Wiki Header

Headers are very useful in order to structure Your text.

Just type one to five "+" plus characters at the beginning of a new line, followed by a blank space and then by the text of Your header line.

++ Example

+ Heading1
++ Heading2
+++ Heading3
++++ Heading4
+++++ Heading5

See also: [Folding], [page structure window], InsertTableofContent.
